skillTree.name: Skeletal Steed
skillTree.description: Wight Kings require the steeds that bore them in life, and will do again in death.

skillTree.name: Barded Skeletal Steed
skillTree.description: Skeletal Steeds draped in fine armour make for an impressive and dangerous sight.

skillTree.name: Grave Ward
skillTree.description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.

skillTree.name: Loyalty Neverending
skillTree.description: Memory is too generous a term, but something inspires the skilled undead to follow this one.

effects.description: Upkeep: -2% for Grave Guard and Black Knights units
Upkeep: -4% for Grave Guard and Black Knights units
Upkeep: -8% for Grave Guard and Black Knights units

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Memories of War
skillTree.description: What's left of this one's memory is little more than endless bloodshed, and they intend to continue their work.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Lizardmen, Dwarfs, High Elves, Greenskins and Men

skillTree.name: Ancient Treasure
skillTree.description: Dig, dig, yes, my servants certainly buried me with my finest adornments.

skillTree.name: Baleful Warding
skillTree.description: With enough time to prepare, the Wight King emboldens the entire horde.

skillTree.name: Dark Origins
skillTree.description: So evil was this one in life that the evil bindings of the undead stiffen and strengthen around them.

skillTree.name: Imbued Offerings
skillTree.description: Ancient baubles imbue this one with magical protections in combat.

skillTree.name: Unnatural Image
skillTree.description: Even the best train beast of war shudder to approach this abomination.

skillTree.name: Barrow Guardians
skillTree.description: Rising to serve the will of their own captain, these Grave Guard sally forth.

ui_effects.description: ➕ Summons a unit of Grave Guard (Halberds) - 60 units

skillTree.name: Legion of the Damned
skillTree.description: RISE. KILL. SERVE.

ui_effects.description: ➕ Summons a unit of Grave Guard (Halberds)

skillTree.name: Cache of Weapons
skillTree.description: A new chamber unearthed, a new source of ancient weapons for our most dedicated.

ui_effects.description: ➕ Summons a unit of Grave Guard (Halberds)

skillTree.name: Cache of Armor
skillTree.description: Scale, plate, and chainmail, left over from times forgotten, but protected from the ravages of time with powerful warding magic.

ui_effects.description: ➕ Summons a unit of Grave Guard (Halberds)

skillTree.name: Retinue: Trainer
skillTree.description: This is no time for rest and games; up, on your feet! We have work to do.

skillTree.name: Spoils
skillTree.description: What was yours is mine now.

skillTree.name: Carrion Swarms
skillTree.description: Carrion follow this army, eager for fresh food.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: -10% for enemy armies starting their turn in this province

skillTree.name: Aura of Supremacy
skillTree.description: "I am mighty, none dare challenge me!"

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 25
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 100

skillTree.name: Spread Public Order
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 1
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 2
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 20% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 4% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 18% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 2% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

skillTree.name: Dark Majesty
skillTree.description: "Glory in your dark majesty, my lord."

skillTree.name: Devious
skillTree.description: Vampires and their liche-servants are devious creatures; manipulative with many mortal servants in their thrall.

skillTree.name: Dread Incarnate
skillTree.description: "They will tremble, my lord, oh, they will fear!"

skillTree.name: Lore Keeper
skillTree.description: Once forbidden knowledge is acquired, Necromancers and Vampires will jealously guard it from rivals' eyes.

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

skillTree.name: Cunning
skillTree.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

skillTree.name: Determined
skillTree.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

skillTree.name: Confident
skillTree.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

skillTree.name: Disciplined
skillTree.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

skillTree.name: Perceptive
skillTree.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

skillTree.name: Aggressive
skillTree.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

skillTree.name: Tough
skillTree.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

skillTree.name: Strong
skillTree.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

skillTree.name: Weapon Master
skillTree.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

skillTree.name: Strategist
skillTree.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

skillTree.name: Tactician
skillTree.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
